<figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nt1jwpxMpK1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><object bgcolor="#000000" data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="620"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=matoroignika&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=v10665054&device_id=817a5d97515a7e58"></object><br/><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/matoroignika" style="padding:2px 0px 4px; display:block; width: 320px; font-weight:normal; font-size:10px; text-decoration:underline;">Watch live video from MatoroIgnika on Twitch</a>

<p>MatoroIgnika begins construction on Station Gamma! He’s

caught the Space Station bug, this is his third construction project in a

short time. <a href="https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/ksp">#KSP</a><br/></p>
